overview: Silly is the fifth album in the Cedarmont Kids classics series from July 6, 1993 and the second video released in 1995. It contains 18 classic kids songs with a few Christian kids songs.  Do Your Ears Hang Low?; The Wise Man and the Foolish Man;  Rocka My Soul;  Skinnymarinky Dinky Dink;  Dry Bones;  Polly Wolly Doodle;  Who Did (Swallow Jonah);  Fingers, Nose and Toes;  Michael Finnegan;  The Bear Went Over the Mountain;  Oh, You Can't Get to Heaven;  S-M-I-L-E;  Who Built the Ark?;  Bingo;  I Got Shoes;  John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt;  Looby Loo;  There's a Hole in the Bucket
title: Cedarmont Kids Silly Songs
